title: So Am I
lyrics: I am what I am, I don't care what you think...

title: Blinding Lights
lyrics: I've been tryna call, I've been on my own for long enough...

title: Shape of You
lyrics: I'm in love with the shape of you, we push and pull like a magnet do...

title: Levitating
lyrics: You want me, I want you, baby, my sugar boo...

title: Bad Guy
lyrics: So you're a tough guy, like it really rough guy...

title: Dance Monkey
lyrics: 'Cause I see you trying, just keep on trying...

title: Watermelon Sugar
lyrics: 'Tastes like strawberries on a summer evening...

title: Peaches
lyrics: 'I got my peaches out in Georgia, I get my weed from California...

title: Good 4 U
lyrics: 'Good for you, I guess you moved on really easily...

title: Montero (Call Me By Your Name)
lyrics: 'Call me when you want, call me when you need...
